snippet: Though conceding there was not enough evidence that Yasir Arafat was poisoned with a radioactive substance, Palestinians said Israel was the main suspect.
abstract: Abdullah Bashir, Palestinian official in charge of investigating 2004 death of Yasir Arafat, renews his accusation that Israel had poisoned Arafat with radioactive polonium-210, despite lack of sufficient evidence.

byline.original: By SAID GHAZALI and JODI RUDOREN

lead_paragraph: Though conceding there was not enough evidence that Yasir Arafat was poisoned with a radioactive substance, Palestinians said Israel was the main suspect.

headline.main: Palestinian Investigator Blames Israel in Arafat’s Death
